movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Poor Things
movies.description: The incredible tale about the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by a brilliant scientist.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: Batman is called to intervene when the mayor of Gotham City is murdered.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
movies.description: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its existence.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.description: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
